question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You would like to participate in a work-related seminar in another country.Write a letter to the person in charge of the seminar and ask for detailed information regarding the dates, program, accommodation and cost.You do NOT need to write any address.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I have become recently aware of a seminar that would take place in Ontario seems to be very interesting, I am writing to you to know further about all the general information, indeed I believe that it would be a good experience, furthermore, it would help me to get a promotion in my work and I hope to be part of this training.

I am working as a Marketing developer in an International company based in MOROCCO, therefore I would know if there is a Marketing session in the program, I am interested in other sessions as well, like customer service or Digital Marketing, also I would be informed about the date of this seminar  since I have to submit a holiday request to my manager for approval, otherwise, it would be difficult to me to assist, the last information that I need as well as if there is a hotel that you are in convention with to benefit for a discount.
I look forward to hearing from you very soon.
